title: Kryptowerk
author: Kryptowerk
created_time: January 13, 2023, 11:11:41 PMLast edit: January 14, 2023, 12:09:39 AM by Kryptowerk
content: This is how I will keep these cards in mind: a hurtful fk-up of epic proportions.If you own a coldkey with my daemon design you are eligable for a free A4 Bitcoin-DAEMON print.See this thread for more info on the print: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5253929.msg54577485#msg54577485Not sure yet if it will get a tiny note regarding this incidient with cold keys recently or not. Probably yes unless majority is against it.Shipping to EU directly from me.Otherwise via minerjones who will be helping me out with US distribution. Thanks man!To receive a print, please send me a private message with a photo of your card(s) and a paper showing your username and current date. Must be clearly visible. Also send me your shipping info if not in US. Otherwise just note that you are in US and shipping will be handled later via MJ.Peeled or not doesn't matter (you probably should peel em, though).I feel sickened by what happened, peeling the cards last night with my own design created over 3 years ago, sucked like nothing I ever experienced in collectible crypto space ever before.My heart goes out to anyone affected by this mess and just hoping to cheer a few folks up a little bit at least.

comments.author: Mitchell
comments.body: I just put all my cards away, will get them out again later to proof that I have this one, but please put me on the list. Thank you man.

comments.author: krogoth
comments.body: Hahaha...love this...I want one...¬† ¬† Coldsweep!¬† Made by Dogg.¬† ¬†Lol

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Thanks to everyone sending me dms with prove of ownership.Please continue to do so. I will not reply until I start the shipping process. This is planned for end of next week - waiting for some tiny prints I ordered to arrive by then.Originally I had intended to give out my already-existing A4-prints. I will do that but also add some tiny thing (see first sketch in OP) on top.

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Very cool of you Kryptowerk, I had a few of those cards I peeled the other day. Will send pics once I go thru the "giant garbage bag" of cards and find them. Was one of my favorite card designs too, such a fucking shame... It is really amazing to see this community when it truly comes together like this in times of scam/crisis.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.created_time: January 15, 2023, 04:31:05 PMLast edit: May 14, 2023, 05:04:22 PM by krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Proof of owning one...I probably own two but I guess this should be enough

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Tiny update.Mini-prints arrived today. Now needs some preparation, I will get the US package on its way tomorrow, to MJ. He will help with redistribution.Any other countries get theirs directly from me.If you already sent me a dm (or posted here) you will get your print. If not, please do so now, including a photo showing you own a ck with my daemon design. Thanks.

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: I got mine today, and am super happy with it, I want to get it framed asap!!Thanks again @Kryptowerk, can't thank you enough, so awesome, I'm now addicted to your stuff...  And thank you MJ.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: also received mine - thank you.happened to have a small mag frame that holds the mini

comments.body: Unfortunately I never recieved mine, if any are still available am I supposed to send mail info to mj or kryptowerk?

comments.body: Quote from: Hookzup1 on May 01, 2023, 07:46:15 PMUnfortunately I never recieved mine, if any are still available am I supposed to send mail info to mj or kryptowerk? I have one for you!Will include next parcel

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: owlcatz on March 10, 2023, 03:27:00 AMI got mine today, and am super happy with it, I want to get it framed asap!!Thanks again @Kryptowerk, can't thank you enough, so awesome, I'm now addicted to your stuff...  And thank you MJ.¬† Oh thanks for the flowers, owl.  I completely missed checking this thread.Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on March 10, 2023, 03:44:24 AMalso received mine - thank you.happened to have a small mag frame that holds the miniWow, awesome, looks great in that mag frame. I always liked the look of these, only usage I had so far was for some CS1s.Quote from: minerjones on May 01, 2023, 09:24:14 PMQuote from: Hookzup1 on May 01, 2023, 07:46:15 PMUnfortunately I never recieved mine, if any are still available am I supposed to send mail info to mj or kryptowerk? I have one for you!Will include next parcel Big shoutout to MJ who has been handling all the re-shipping to all US-based folks.¬†  Quote from: haloxon on May 02, 2023, 05:39:51 AMQuote from: Hookzup1 on May 01, 2023, 07:46:15 PMUnfortunately I never recieved mine, if any are still available am I supposed to send mail info to mj or kryptowerk? same here. maybe there were not enough for all victims.Sorry to hear it. I doubt there weren't enough - I included anyone that sent me a message with proove of coldscam cards with my design plus some spare extra. There are 128 mini-cards and around 15 big prints.Two parcels were sent out, one to cygan for Euro-based and one to MJ for US-based.That being said, I never heard back from cygan and also didn't get a response to an inquiry DM. It's been way over two months now and I didn't check-up any further, kind of trying to put that ck-disaster behind me.

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on May 02, 2023, 05:57:28 AM‚úÇThat being said, I never heard back from cygan and also didn't get a response to an inquiry DM. It's been way over two months now and I didn't check-up any further, kind of trying to put that ck-disaster behind me.sorry that i didn't give you or the eu-victims any feedback... i have totally forgotten about it of course i got the small cards from Kryptowerk and of course they will be sent to the respective users like haloxon.but since i am currently in the stress of moving, i would like to postpone all this until next month.

comments.body: Quote from: cygan on May 02, 2023, 06:15:11 AMQuote from: Kryptowerk on May 02, 2023, 05:57:28 AM‚úÇThat being said, I never heard back from cygan and also didn't get a response to an inquiry DM. As long as everybody can get their cards I am happy. Moving can be quite stressful, hope you get through it without any hickups.On a sidenote, I noticed you still got positive trust for yogg, maybe it's about time to remove it?

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: cygan on May 10, 2023, 02:55:03 PMQuote from: Kryptowerk on May 10, 2023, 01:43:55 PM‚úÇÔ∏èOn a sidenote, I noticed you still got positive trust for yogg, maybe it's about time to remove it? ¬† i know and i wanted to 'delete/remove' it back then only i can't find an option with which i can do that... maybe you have an idea?When you click on a profile's trust rating, there is a tiny (Delete) button/link at the end of each submitted trust feedback - ofc only the ones that are coming from your account.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.created_time: June 01, 2023, 10:51:44 AMLast edit: June 03, 2023, 12:08:07 AM by Kryptowerk
comments.body: Just checking in, any update on the distribution for our Euro based folks?To anyone that had a ck card with this design, but hasn't received this special card yet, a reminder you can send proof to me or MJ (us) or cygan (eu).

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on June 01, 2023, 10:51:44 AMJust checking in, any update on the distribution for our Euro based folks?‚úÇi am now finally able to send these cards to the eu people so i would ask haloxon and all others to send me a pm with their addresses.
